sense.def:
Left
je preteklik in pretekli deležnik glagola
to leave
.

gramGrp.pos:
PRED ADJ
or
ADV
after
N

sense.def:
Kadar je določena količina nečesa
left
ali
left over
, ostane, potem ko drugo izgine ali je porabljeno.

seg.quote: I only had two pounds left.
He drained what was left of his drink.
We had a bit of time left over.

sense.def:
Left
je ena od dveh nasprotnih si smeri, strani ali položajev. V besedi
to
je ‘t’ na levi strani črke ‘o’.

seg.quote: There was a gate on our left leading into a field.
He turned left and began strolling down the street.
In his left hand he clutched a book.

sense.def:
Besedo
The Left
uporabljamo za osebe ali skupine, ki zagovarjajo socializem, ne pa kapitalizem.
